thread.title: New York Mets-Los Angeles Dodgers in NLDS Game 4: Start time, what TV channel, how to watch live stream online
thread.title_full: New York Mets-Los Angeles Dodgers in NLDS Game 4: Start time, what TV channel, how to watch live stream online | OregonLive.com

author: JD Humburg | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: New York Mets-Los Angeles Dodgers in NLDS Game 4: Start time, what TV channel, how to watch live stream online
text:
The Los Angeles Dodgers and New York Mets resume their best-of-five National League Division Series with Tuesday's Game 4 in New York.
The Mets lead the series 2-1 and will advance to the National League Championship Series with another win.
Here are details on how to watch and listen to the game online:
What : Los Angeles Dodgers at New York Mets in NLDS Game 4. New York leads series 2-1.
Where : Citi Field, New York
When : Tuesday, October 13, at 5:07 p.m. PT/8:07 p.m. ET
What TV channel : TV on TBS, radio on KMTT (910 AM) in Portland area
Online live stream : Watch online at WatchTBS or listen at ESPNRadio.com
Pitching matchup : Los Angeles' Clayton Kershaw vs. New York's Steven Matz
Playoff schedule : Bookmark our MLB scoreboard for postseason scores and schedules.
